title: The Kids Belong Back In School (Ep 1297)
description:
In this episode, I address the liberal’s real plan to destroy your police department and render you defenseless. I also address the media’s disgusting disinformation campaign on the coronavirus as it relates to your child’s education. 

News Picks:


20 reasons to re-elect Donald Trump.

Everyone wore masks during the 1918 flu pandemic wore masks. They were useless. 


Why facemasks don’t work.

Los Angeles teacher’s union makes ridiculous demands before they’ll go back to school. 


Wikipedia is a garbage, conspiracy theorist website that attacks conservatives.

New York City is descending into chaos and madness.


Thank you for making us one the most listened to and viewed shows in the country!
